resources.string:
Get flight time at the
 Vancouver International Airport.
 
 1. Enter a flight# (e.g AC8)
 or an airline (e.g. Air Canada)
 or a location (e.g. London)
 2. Click Arrival or Departure
 3. Get the flight time
 
 It is just this simple!
 
 Flight info is obtained from
 the www.yvr.ca website.
 
 Please consider donate $1
 if this app is useful to you.
